content: It's great to hear that Hitarth Parikh received congratulations from Saina Nehwal in front of the whole university during the gifting of the Helios product. It must have been a proud moment for him to see his work recognized and appreciated by such a renowned athlete. The video of the event could be a valuable asset for Hyperlab, as it showcases the product's potential and Saina's endorsement. It could also inspire other athletes and sports tech enthusiasts to take an interest in the product and encourage them to explore its uses in their training.
